argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | idlnegcl.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | idlnegcl.2 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ran G = ran G |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_idlss | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) -> I C_ ran G ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ssel2 | |- ( ( I C_ ran G /\ A e. I ) -> A e. ran G ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 2nd ` R ) = ( 2nd ` R ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) = ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 6, 3, 2, 7 | #P_rngonegmn1l | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. ran G ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( ( N ` ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) ) ( 2nd ` R ) A ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( I C_ ran G /\ A e. I ) ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( ( N ` ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) ) ( 2nd ` R ) A ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_anassrs | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I C_ ran G ) /\ A e. I ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( ( N ` ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) ) ( 2nd ` R ) A ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 10 | #P_syldanl | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ A e. I ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( ( N ` ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) ) ( 2nd ` R ) A ) ) |
| 12 | 1 | #P_rneqi | |- ran G = ran ( 1st ` R ) |
| 13 | 12, 6, 7 | #P_rngo1cl | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) e. ran G ) |
| 14 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_rngonegcl | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) e. ran G ) -> ( N ` ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) ) e. ran G ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_mpdan | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( N ` ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) ) e. ran G ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_ad2antrr | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ A e. I ) -> ( N ` ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) ) e. ran G ) |
| 17 | 1, 6, 3 | #P_idllmulcl | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ ( A e. I /\ ( N ` ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) ) e. ran G ) ) -> ( ( N ` ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) ) ( 2nd ` R ) A ) e. I ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_anassrs | |- ( ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ A e. I ) /\ ( N ` ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) ) e. ran G ) -> ( ( N ` ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) ) ( 2nd ` R ) A ) e. I ) |
| 19 | 16, 18 | #P_mpdan | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ A e. I ) -> ( ( N ` ( GId ` ( 2nd ` R ) ) ) ( 2nd ` R ) A ) e. I ) |
| 20 | 11, 19 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ A e. I ) -> ( N ` A ) e. I ) |
